paper_abstract: This paper presents an automatic acquisition process to acquire the semantic meaning for the words. This process obtains the representation vectors for stemmed words by iteratively improving the vectors, using a trained Elman network. Experiments performed on a corpus composed of Shakespeare's writings show its linguistic analysis and categorization abilities. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Modeling word perception using the Elman network
